name: UpsertMerchantCustomAttributesBulk
description:
Bulk creates or updates custom attributes for a merchant.

Use this tool to set multiple custom attributes for a merchant based on predefined definitions in a Square seller account. It processes 1 to 25 upsert requests, each providing a unique ID, merchant ID, and custom attribute data. Returns mapped responses with the ID of each request.

parameters.name: merchant_custom_attributes_data
parameters.description: A JSON object containing 1 to 25 upsert requests. Each request needs a unique ID and details to create or update a custom attribute for a merchant.

values.description:
A map containing 1 to 25 individual upsert requests. For each request, provide an
arbitrary ID that is unique for this `BulkUpsertMerchantCustomAttributes` request and the
information needed to create or update a custom attribute.

value_schema.description:
An object containing the fields to POST for the request.

See the corresponding object definition for field details.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the squareup API.

parameters.description:
